name: nuxt-bootstrap-icons
description: Just a simple integration for Bootstrap Icons

scripts.dev:prepare: tsc --module nodenext setup.ts && node setup.js && nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && pnpm lint && nuxi prepare docs && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release:major: pnpm prepack && pnpm lint && changelogen --release --major --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm prepack && pnpm lint && changelogen --release --minor --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: pnpm prepack && pnpm lint && changelogen --release --patch --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags
